name: IT201_Sprint3 (DrGregoryHouse)
description: This app allows you to paint different shapes onto a canvas that has different sizes, colors, rotations and animations. Also, the app allows you to toggle the transparency of objects. The user will interact with the app with just their mouse to paint onto the canvas. When you drag the sliders with the labels red, green, or blue this will change the range of color that an object can be when it is created.  When you drag the slider with the label delta this will change the rotation amount every time an object is created placing the objects in different directions. When you click on the toggle labeled timed destroy this will turn on and off how objects are automatically deleted. When you click on the button labeled destroy all it will destroy all objects in the world. When you click on the dropdown labeled change shape this will give you 6 different options to change the shape of the objects being created. 3 of the shapes you can pick are prefabs that all have animations you can change in the window. There is also a slider that will allow you to change the speed of the animations.
